Advanced.FiscalHosting.deactivate.warnin:
It is not possible to deactivate your organization as a fiscal host because you are currently hosting {totalHostedAccounts} accounts.

To deactivate, they need to be moved to a different fiscal host or archived.

For more information on closing your fiscal host, please read our documentation.
Advanced.MoneyManagement.deactivate.conf:
Deactivating money management functionalities will also remove any existing integration with Stripe, Wise and PayPal.

After deactivation, you can easily reactivate it at any time.

becomeAHost.aBetterExperience.descriptio: Reporting is automatic and real-time, so everyone can see the up to date budget at any time. Projects can have more direct control over their funds, while fiscal sponsors can ensure everything is done according to their policies.
becomeAHost.benefit.combineFunding.descr: I collettivi possono cercare sostegno attraverso diversi canali e tenere conto di tutto in un unico budget. Il crowdfunding, i pagamenti tramite carta di credito e la vendita di biglietti per eventi sono integrati. Puoi facilmente accreditare il denaro trasferito tramite qualsiasi altro mezzo nel giusto budget.
becomeAHost.benefit.easyExpense.descript: Per prelevare denaro, i beneficiari inviano le spese attraverso la piattaforma, con le relative fatture e ricevute. Visualizza e approva facilmente le spese nella dashboard dell'amministratore. Il pagamento tramite bonifico bancario o PayPal è integrato, in modo da poter pagare con un solo clic.
becomeAHost.benefit.inDepthReports.descr: Non c'è bisogno di spendere tempo a creare rapporti per i finanziatori, è tutto documentato automaticamente e in modo trasparente di continuo. Inoltre, riceverai un resoconto consolidato ogni mese con tutte le transazioni e la documentazione inclusa. Il tuo commercialista ti ringrazierà!
becomeAHost.benefit.keepTrack: Tieni traccia {lineBreak} di tutti i budget
becomeAHost.benefit.keepTrack.descriptio: Crea Collettivi per quanti più progetti necessiti, in pochi click, senza costi aggiuntivi. Ognuno ha la propria pagina di fundraising, monitoraggio del budget e impegno della community. I pagamenti in entrata sono aggiunti al saldo del giusto Collettivo. Niente fogli di calcolo richiesti!
becomeAHost.caseStudies.allforclimate-co: Uno sponsor fiscale per il tuo gruppo di giustizia climatica locale, agiamo come un ufficio amministrativo condiviso così che i gruppi locali possano concentrarsi sulle proprie azioni.
becomeAHost.caseStudies.opensource: Forniamo l'infrastruttura finanziaria e legale per migliaia di progetti open source. Siamo un'API tra il mondo della collaborazione distribuita e il mondo della contabilità e le fatture.
becomeAHost.caseStudies.socialchangenest: Siamo riusciti a supportare oltre 150 gruppi di Mutuo Soccorso per proseguire rapidamente fornendo loro supporto d'ufficio d'hosting fiscale.
becomeAHost.caseStudies.wwcode: Ogni volta che avviamo un nuovo capitolo di incontri, lo abbiniamo a un Open Collective così che abbiano i mezzi per raccogliere denaro sotto al nostro ombrello.
becomeAHost.description: Open Collective è stato creato appositamente per semplificare i processi, ridurre le spese generali, aumentare la trasparenza e consentire alla tua organizzazione di detenere e gestire fondi per più progetti in meno tempo. <learnMoreLink>Ulteriori informazioni</learnMoreLink>.
becomeAHost.entity: Qualsiasi ente con un conto bancario
becomeAHost.entity.description: Chi gestisce più progetti e vuole utilizzare le funzionalità della piattaforma Open Collective per il monitoraggio trasparente del budget, combinando flussi di entrate, gestione dei pagamenti delle spese e coinvolgimento della community.
becomeAHost.fiscalSponsorshipService: Fornitori di servizi di sponsorizzazione fiscale
becomeAHost.fiscalSponsorshipService.des: Nell'area geografica o industriale da loro scelta.
becomeAHost.grantMakers.description: Chi vuole ridurre gli ostacoli ai progetti non incorporati e alle iniziative informali, garantendo nel contempo una solida sorveglianza.
becomeAHost.increaseCapacity.description: Open Collective consente di offrire più servizi a più progetti in meno tempo. Un gran numero di transazioni non ti travolgerà, perché la piattaforma automatizza la maggior parte del lavoro e raccoglie anche le commissioni di deposito che hai impostato.
becomeAHost.joinUsSection.subtitle: Open Collective rende brillante la sponsorizzazione fiscale. I concessionari e i partecipanti al progetto apprezzeranno la semplicità e l'accessibilità, e apprezzerete l'enorme riduzione delle spese generali.
becomeAHost.networks.description: Chi vuole abilitare la raccolta di fondi locali mentre gestisce una singola entità giuridica comune, come incontri e movimenti sociali.
becomeAHost.nonprofits: Organizzazioni no profit e di beneficenza
becomeAHost.nonprofits.description: Chi vuole consentire ai progetti non corporati che proseguono le loro aree di missione di ricevere sovvenzioni e donazioni sotto il loro ombrello.
becomeAHost.reduceOverhead.description: Quando devi gestire fondi per molti progetti o gruppi, è semplice sentirsi travolti da fogli di calcolo complessi e innumerevoli conversazioni di email. Open Collective automatizza il tracciamento del budget, segnalazione, elaborazione delle spese e dei pagamenti, rendendo il tuo lavoro molto più semplice.
becomeAHost.title: La sponsorizzazione fiscale non è mai stata così facile
becomeAHost.whatAreTheBenefits: Quali sono i benefici di ospitare con noi?
becomeAHost.whatAreTheBenefits.descripti: Accetta donazioni e sponsorizzazioni, celebra i tuoi sostenitori, paga le spese e mantieni tutti aggiornati: tutto in un unico posto.
becomeASponsor.backYourStack.description: Scopri le tue dipendenze Open Source e supportale.
becomeASponsor.bulkPayments.description: Invece di pagare con carta di credito ad ogni Collective, è possibile inviare un unico pagamento all' ospite fiscale per il credito alla vostra organizzazione sulla piattaforma. Quindi è possibile utilizzare questo saldo per finanziare quanti Collettivi si desidera.
becomeASponsor.giftOfGiving.description: Crea carte regalo: per dipendenti, clienti, candidati al reclutamento, partecipanti all'evento, in modo che la tua comunità possa essere autorizzata a supportare i Collettivi di cui si occupano, con la tua Organizzazione come finanziatore riconosciuto.
becomeASponsor.giftOfGiving.title: Fai il dono del dare
becomeASponsor.invoiceReceipts.descripti: Donare denaro ad una comunità, ad un movimento o ad un progetto senza posizione fiscale può essere un incubo contabile. Open Collective risolve questo problema con la documentazione per ogni transazione.
becomeASponsor.monthlyInvoice: Inoltre, ottieni una fattura mensile consolidata per tutti i tuoi contributi sulla piattaforma: il tuo ragioniere ti ringrazierà!
becomeASponsor.moreFeatures.description: Scopri le possibilità delle nostre funzionalità.
becomeASponsor.moreFeatures.title: Altre funzionalità
becomeASponsor.paperWork: Ci occuperemo noi delle pratiche burocratiche
becomeASponsor.paperWork.description: The Fiscal Host of the Collective you want to support is an established legal entity who can engage with your vendor systems and purchase order processes, and meet documentation requirements like tax forms and signing agreements.
becomeASponsor.reporting.description: Oltre ai rapporti mensili, i Collettivi possono pubblicare aggiornamenti regolari sui loro progressi e sull'impatto del tuo supporto, inoltre puoi dare un'occhiata al loro budget in qualsiasi momento: è come un rapporto che si scrive da solo!
becomeASponsor.supportCommunities: Sostieni le comunità e aiutale a crescere.
becomeASponsor.supportCommunities.descri: La piattaforma Open Collective consente alle entità sponsor fiscali di ospitare gruppi non costituiti in società, fornendo loro una struttura legale con cui è possibile impegnarsi.
becomeASponsor.supportProjects.descripti: Unisciti a questi grandi fondatori e sponsor e supportare fantastiche iniziative. Contributi trasparenti e tutti gli strumenti di cui hai bisogno per sbarazzarti della burocrazia. Tutto in un unico posto.
Unisciti a questi grandi fondatori e sponsor che supportano Collettivi.
becomeASponsor.supportProjects.title: Supporta progetti e comunità
becomeASponsor.sustainersKit.description: We know making the case up the chain is not always easy. For all you heroes inside companies, we put together <Link>some resources to help you succeed</Link>.
becomeASponsor.transparency.description: Puoi vedere direttamente l'impatto dei tuoi contributi, in tempo reale, perché i bilanci dei Collettivi sono trasparenti

createcollective.opensource.p1: You're creating software. You don't want to worry about creating a legal entity or bank account, taxes, invoices, and a bunch of other admin. Let us take care of all that, so you can stay focused on your project.
createcollective.opensource.p2: We have created the {osclink}, a non-profit umbrella organization, to serve the open source community. To join, you need to meet our {criterialink}.
createcollective.opensource.p4: Our fees cover operating costs like accounting, payments, tax reporting, invoices, legal liability, use of the Open Collective Platform, and providing support. We also run a range of initiatives to support a sustainable and healthy open source ecosystem. Join us!

createProfile.faq.persoVsOrg.content: Organizations represent a company or entity, while individual profiles represent a person. Organization profiles can have multiple team members (individual profiles) who have access to edit it and make financial contributions in its name. If a contribution or expense is for a company, it's important to use an organization profile so the correct billing information shows up on receipts and invoices. Organizations can also issue gift cards.

FiscalHost.ApplyMessage.hint: These instructions appear on the application form (1000 character max)
Fiscalhost.definition: A Fiscal Host is an entity that holds the money on behalf of a Collective, and takes care of accounting, taxes, and invoices.
FiscalHost.HostFee.description: Enable collecting a fee from contributions to the collectives you host.
FiscalHost.HostFeePercent.hint: Calculate the fee as a percentage of the contribution amount.
FiscalHost.OpenToApplications.Descriptio: Enable new collectives to apply to join your fiscal host.
FiscalHost.Settings.Description: Supporting collectives under your umbrella by providing them with legal and financial infrastructure.
FiscalHost.ToS.description: Link the terms and conditions under which your Host collects and holds funds. This appears on your public profile page and application form.
fiscalHosting.applyToFiscalHost.descript: <orgsAroundTheWorldLink>Organizations around the world</orgsAroundTheWorldLink> are using Open Collective to host multiple projects, groups and communities. Find out more about them! Or you can <createYourOwnFiscalHostLink>create your own fiscal host</createYourOwnFiscalHostLink>.
fiscalHosting.community.description: To current events, like a pandemic, who need to get operational immediately.
fiscalHosting.companiesGivingBack.descri: Can work with a nonprofit fiscal host to separate funds from the commercial side and coordinate grants and sponsorships.
fiscalHosting.crowdFunding.description: Seeking a place to hold the money and a way to offer accountability to their backers.
fiscalHosting.description: Think of your community, project, or initiative as a plant, and a fiscal host as a lovingly tended garden. The host maintains an environment where your unique bush, vine, or tree can get watered, grow, and bloom.
fiscalHosting.distributeCollaboration.de: Like an open source software project, which isn’t owned by anyone and wants resources held in common.
fiscalHosting.feature.acceptAndSpendFund: You can often get approved very quickly, even instantly, ready to receive and disburse funds and get operational. Compared with traditional fiscal sponsorship or setting up your own entity, activating with a fiscal host is super streamlined.
fiscalHosting.feature.automaticReporting: No need to spend hours creating reports for funders. The Open Collective platform has automated quantitative reporting built in. Just send the funder a link to your page! There are great tools for qualitative reporting too, like posting blogs and newsletters, which also serve to keep your wider community engaged and up to date.
fiscalHosting.feature.networkingAndSolid: A fiscal host is by definition a community of projects with something in common. They can provide services to their community as a whole, and enable connections between projects. Whether it’s about joining budgets or joining voices, join a host that’s more than the sum of its parts.
fiscalHosting.feature.organizeFinance: Organize your finances, all in one place
fiscalHosting.feature.organizeFinance.de: No more messy spreadsheets! Income from credit card transactions, bank transfers, PayPal, even ticket sales, grants, and sponsorships are all tracked automatically in one transparent budget. With a robust yet user-friendly system for submitting and approving expenses, tracking outgoing funds is a breeze, too.
fiscalHosting.feature.sustainabilityDesi: If your project doesn’t have an expiration date, neither should your funding. A standard crowdfunding campaign is over once it’s over. A single grant is spent once it’s spent. But fiscal hosting helps you combine different income streams and form ongoing relationships with funders.
fiscalHosting.fees.description: Fiscal hosts often charge a fee for the service they provide. Some hosts keep fees low and offer a lightweight service, while others have higher fees and provide more support. Some fiscal hosts don’t charge fees at all.
fiscalHosting.findingRightFiscalHost: Finding the right fiscal host for you
fiscalHosting.findingRightFiscalHost.des: Some key things to consider when looking for the right fit
FiscalHosting.fiscalHost.description: Host collectives and hold money on their behalf (oversee their contributions and expenses). Setup funds and distribute grants on the platform.
fiscalHosting.founderCoalition.descripti: Of foundations or other funders, joining to support an impact area, who need money to sit in a neutral space.
FiscalHosting.Functionalities.descriptio: Your organization can be used to make contributions on the platform and to submit payment requests. See the options below for more advanced financial capabilities.
fiscalHosting.grantMakingInstitution.des: Who may be restricted to funding registered charities, seeking to partner with a fiscal host in order reach less formal communities.
fiscalHosting.grantRecipients.descriptio: Who need a place to receive the funds and hold them as they are spent down.
fiscalHosting.hosts.allForClimate: Dedicated to movements for climate and social justice, host to many local Extinction Rebellion chapters and related communities.
fiscalHosting.hosts.giftcollective: A NZ-based charitable entity hosting grassroots/community groups with a charitable focus.
fiscalHosting.hosts.OCE: A Brussels-based nonprofit hosting groups across Europe, including open source projects and community social action.
fiscalHosting.hosts.OSC: A US 501(c)(6) nonprofit entity serving as fiscal host to open source projects and related communities around the world.
fiscalHosting.hosts.platform6: Using tech and platform/ecosystem thinking to grow the cooperative economy through P2P mutual support and collaborative crowdfunding.
fiscalHosting.hosts.raft: Raft Foundation is a US-based 501(c)(3) fiscal sponsor that brings communities together to support neighbors in need.
fiscalHosting.hosts.socialchangenestcoll: A UK host for mutual aid groups and social movements, providing tools, strategy, and back office support to scale up and get on with changing the world.
fiscalHosting.howCanAFiscalHostHelp: How can a fiscal host help?
fiscalHosting.legalStructure.description: Do you want your host to be a charity, a company, a cooperative, or something else? E.g. a charity structure can enable tax-deductible donations, but may also have more restrictions on allowed activities.
fiscalHosting.location.description: Which country a fiscal host is based in will determine the currency you your money will be accounted in, and where you are located in a legal sense, e.g., if you are applying for an EU grant, you might need a fiscal host based in the EU.
fiscalHosting.missionAlignment.descripti: Fiscal hosts usually have specific topics or areas they are designed to serve. When it comes to the application process, their acceptance criteria will fit in that scope.
FiscalHosting.moneyManagement.deactivate: Deactivating money management will also deactivate fiscal hosting.
FiscalHosting.moneyManagement.descriptio: Hold a balance & create accounts to manage your money. Use your accounts to receive contributions and pay expenses on the platform.
fiscalHosting.newlyFormingCharity.descri: Who wants to enable tax-deductible donations and philanthropic grants, without waiting to get charity status themselves.
fiscalHosting.operations.description: There are a few different models of fiscal sponsorship (depending on country as well). Check to see that you are using the one that is best for your project. Also look into the sponsor’s company culture & history of expertise in the field to ensure your fiscal sponsorship relationship aligns with your needs.
fiscalHosting.timeLimited.description: Where it doesn't make sense to set up a whole new organization only to wind it up six months later.
fiscalHosting.title: A place to grow and thrive
fiscalHosting.unincorporatedGroup.descri: Like a meetup, needing to fundraise, collect membership dues, or sign a contract with a venue or sponsor.
fiscalHosting.whatAreTheBenefits.mission: Fiscal hosts take care of a lot of the tedious and painful administrative tasks involved in running an organization. The host becomes your legal entity, handling taxes, invoicing, and accounting—so you can spend your time engaging supporters, building your community, and achieving your main mission.
fiscalHosting.whatAreTheBenefits.moneyMa: Using your personal bank account can complicate your taxes, and it locks out other team members. A fiscal host holds money on your behalf in its bank account, tracking everything transparently on Open Collective. Everyone can have access to see the budget and to tools for fundraising and requesting payouts.
fiscalHosting.whatAreTheBenefits.subTitl: Organizing takes work. Fiscal hosts are here to help.
fiscalHosting.whatAreTheBenefits.taxExem: Some fiscal hosts are registered charities or nonprofits, who are able to provide tax benefits to donors and qualify for philanthropic grants. Signing up with a fiscal host who already has this status in your country gives you immediate access.
fiscalHosting.whatAreTheBenefits.title: What are the benefits?
fiscalHosting.whatIsFiscalHost.descripti: A fiscal host is an organization that welcomes others to operate through their structure, so projects can use the host’s legal entity and bank account instead of setting up their own. The host provides administrative services, oversight, and support. {lineBreak}{lineBreak} *Fiscal hosting is also called fiscal sponsorship, fund-holding, or auspicing in different places around the world.
fiscalHosting.whoIsFiscalHostingFor.subt: There are multiple cases where fiscal hosting can be valuable for a project.
fiscalHosting.youngActivists.description: Who may lack the experience to manage their own legal entity.

home.accounting.description: No need to balance your checkbook. It’s all accessible here on the platform.
home.collaborateWithMoney.description: A shared account to fundraise and manage money, connect with your people, and more.
home.collaborativeMoneyManagement.descri: We provide the infrastructure for effective financial coordination. Enabling organizations, groups and communities to build trust around money.
home.communityEngagement.description: Post updates, create events, connect your website, or use your Open Collective page with your custom url.
home.contributeToPlatform.description: Open Collective è gratuito per le iniziative benefiche. Ci affidiamo alla generosità dei collaboratori come te per rendere possibile tutto questo.
home.feature.celebrateSupporters.descrip: Una classifica dei tuoi migliori finanziatori, che inoltre evidenzia come la tua intera comunità contribuisce in modi diversi.
home.feature.engageCommunity.description: Pubblica aggiornamenti per coinvolgere i sostenitori, condividere i tuoi progressi e l'impatto dei loro finanziamenti. Utilizza le conversazioni per incoraggiare discussioni della comunità.
home.feature.getMonthlyReports.descripti: Un riepilogo delle attività del tuo gruppo, progressi sugli obiettivi del budget, nuovi contributori e dettagli delle spese, con tutti i dati delle transazioni e ricevute/fatture allegate.
home.feature.manageExpenses.description: Contributori e fornitori possono facilmente inviare ricevute e fatture. Puoi approvarli o rifiutarli e una volta pagati, il tuo saldo sarà automaticamente aggiornato.
home.feature.receiveContributions.descri: Accetta pagamenti tramite carta di credito, bonifico bancario e PayPal. Definisci livelli personalizzati e imposta obiettivi per motivare i tuoi sostenitori a donare.
home.feature.shareBudget.description: Tutti possono vedere da dove proviene il denaro e come viene speso. Trasparenza e responsabilità senza bisogno di fogli di calcolo o lavoro extra!
home.featureSection.subTitle: Scopri le nostre funzionalità.
home.featureSection.title: Come utilizzare Open Collective
home.fiscalHosting.description: Operate under the umbrella of an established legal entity, so you don’t have to incorporate your own. A Host can take care of accounting, taxes, banking, and non-profit status.
home.fiscalHostSection.explanation1: Stai cercando qualcuno che possa gestire e distribuire denaro per il tuo progetto?
home.fiscalHostSection.explanation2: Gli organizzatori fiscali gestiscono per te i fondi, le tasse, la contabilità, la responsabilità legale e i pagamenti.
home.fiscalHostSection.title: Hai bisogno di un organizzatore fiscale per la tua comunità?
home.fiscalHostSection.title.xl: Hai bisogno di un organizzatore fiscale?
home.fundraising.description: Publicly display your budget and transactions to build trust from contributors and donors.
home.futureIsCollective.description: We make it easy to raise, manage, and disburse money with full transparency. Start your open collective, apply to a Fiscal Host, and unlock funding for your community—free from red tape.
home.getToKnowUs.description: Browse stories, blog posts, resources, and get support from the community.
home.joinUsSection.ourStories: Open Collective aims to foster transparency and sustainability in communities around the world, see how you could.
home.joinUsSection.title: Unisciti al movimento
home.joinUsSection.weNeedUpdate: Inviamo aggiornamenti una volta al mese.
home.learnMore.blog: Ricevi casi studio, notizie e scopri come i gruppi di tutto il mondo utilizzano Open Collective.
home.learnMore.discord: Come meet the team, chat with the community, and share your questions and stories.
home.learnMore.documentation: Support your community with fundholding and fiscal sponsorship services.
home.learnMore.openCompany: I nostri dati, le nostre finanze e altri documenti sono pubblici.
home.learnMore.openFinances: Operiamo in quanto collettivo aperto noi stessi, con budget trasparenti.
home.learnMore.OpenSourceCode: Il nostro codice è open source. Puoi contribuire anche tu! Dai un'occhiata su GitHub.
home.learnMore.openSourceCode.buttonText: Vedi la nostra base di codici
home.makeCommunitySection.description: La comunità è basata sulla fiducia e sulla condivisione. Open Collective ti permette di gestire le tue finanze in modo che tutti possano vedere da dove proviene il denaro e come viene speso.
home.makeCommunitySection.subTitle: Raccogli e spendi denaro in modo trasparente.
home.OC.fiscalHosts.xl: Trova il giusto organizzatore fiscale per te:
home.OCusers.meetups: Quasi 100 sezioni di Women Who Code utilizzano Open Collective per raccogliere denaro a livello locale e assegnare finanziamenti in tutta la loro rete.
home.OCusers.movements: Molti gruppi XR locali utilizzano Open Collective per essere trasparenti, coinvolgere le loro comunità e coprire le loro spese.
home.OCusers.opensource: Più di 2.500 comunità open source utilizzano Open Collective per ricevere denaro da aziende e individui.
home.OCUsersSection.subtitle: Le comunità di tutto il mondo stanno usando Open Collective. Scopri di più su di loro!
home.payment.description: Accept funds, transfer money, pay people and create invoices.
home.powerfulMoneyTools.description: Pay expenses, receive donations, manage grants, sell event tickets, get a virtual card linked to your balance, and more!
home.raiseMoney.description: We do the paperwork so you can focus on your mission.
home.raiseMoney.description2: Whether you're a <mutualAidLink>mutual aid group</mutualAidLink>, a <communityLink>community initiative</communityLink>, an <opensourceLink>open-source software project</opensourceLink>, or a <climateLink>climate change activist</climateLink>, Open Collective helps groups unlock access to money.
home.reporting.description: No more messy spreadsheets. Open Collective updates live to make reporting easy. Auditors and grantmakers love us!
home.sharedAccount.description: Manage your budget together. Transparency builds trust and accountability, and no individual has to take on all the responsibility.
home.solutions.legallyIncorporated.descr: For Foundations, Non-Profits, Companies, Public Sector and Co-ops
home.solutions.legallyIncorporated.title: Legally Incorporated
home.solutions.title: Tell us who you are
home.solutions.unincorporated.descriptio: For Collectives, Groups and Projects without a legal identity
home.solutions.unincorporated.feature2: Need access to a legal status
home.solutions.unincorporated.feature3: Need a trusted home for your money
home.solutions.unincorporated.title: Unincorporated
home.stat: Over 15,000 groups around the world raised and managed USD $35M last year
home.stat.checkout: Check out these amazing Collectives and connect with them.
home.weAreOpenSection.subtitle: We not only help you be transparent, we are too!
home.weAreOpenSection.title: Siamo aperti in tutti i sensi
home.weDedicatedTeam: We are a dedicated team of people working to spread power and wealth
home.weDedicatedTeam.description: Open Collective is made possible by an international team of people who are committed to community-control of technology. Connect with us.
home.whatCanYouDoSection.areYouReady: Sei pronto a rendere la tua comunità sostenibile?
home.whatCanYouDoSection.collectMoney.lo: Ricevi denaro tramite carta di credito, PayPal o bonifico bancario e traccia tutto nel tuo budget in maniera trasparente. Definisci diversi modi in cui le persone possono contribuire con livelli e ricompense personalizzabili.
home.whatCanYouDoSection.manageMoney.lon: Crea collettivi per diversi progetti per un facile monitoraggio di budget. Non c'è bisogno di fogli di calcolo disordinati! I report mensili automatici rendono la contabilità un gioco da ragazzi.
home.whatCanYouDoSection.spendMoney.long: Chiunque nella tua comunità può inviare spese. Una volta approvate, paga in un solo clic con PayPal o bonifico bancario. Tutte le transazioni sono pubbliche nel tuo budget trasparente (con dati personali mantenuti privati).
home.whatCanYouDoSection.subTitle: Accetta donazioni e sponsorizzazioni, celebra i tuoi sostenitori, paga le spese e mantieni tutti aggiornati: tutto in un unico posto.
home.whatCanYouDoSection.title: Cosa puoi fare con Open Collective?
home.whatIsGreatAboutOC: Cosa rende Open Collective così straordinario?
home.whatIsGreatAboutOC.description: Una gestione del denaro resa semplice, ottimi strumenti per motivare la tua comunità, report di budget e sponsorizzazioni fiscali.

HostDashboard.description: Easily manage budgets and expenses across all your Collectives, including automated credit card payments through Stripe and one-click payouts via Paypal and Wise.
howItWorks.builtWithResilient.descriptio: Unlike other crowdfunding platforms, Open Collective is designed for ongoing collaborations. That means your funding and community of support doesn’t disappear after a single campaign, or if the initial organizers move on.
howItWorks.description: Open Collective enables all kinds of groups to raise, manage, and spend money transparently. Our open source software platform engages contributors and supporters, automates admin, and helps you tell your story.
howItWorks.embeddable.description: You can display the Open Collective contribution component directly on your own website, meaning people don’t need to leave your page to pay.
howItWorks.events.description: Host online or offline events, with ticket sale revenue going straight to your transparent budget.
howItWorks.extraSecurity.description: Optional 2-factor authentication. As a tool for managing money, we take security very seriously.
howItWorks.features.subtitle: Collective budget management made simple
howItWorks.HowOCIsDifferent.title: Open Collective is different
howItWorks.moneyManagement.description: Open Collective uniquely combines a powerful tech platform with fiscal hosting, enabling Collectives to raise and spend money without legally incorporating, worrying about taxes, or opening a bank account.
howItWorks.openIsBetter.description: Our code is fully transparent and open source, just like our budget. You own your data: we’ll never sell it or lock you in.
howItWorks.projects.description: Manage a grant or raise money for a specific purpose, with flexible tools for segregating your budget.
howItWorks.transparentByDesign.descripti: The first thing you’ll notice is transparency—everyone can see where money comes from and where it goes—but it doesn’t end there...
howItWorks.virtualCards.description: Spend money anywhere you’d use a credit or debit card online, linked directly to your Open Collective funds (this beta feature is only available to certain fiscal hosts).

pricing.new.faq.governance.question: Who manages the platform and how is the pricing set?
pricing.new.faq.tips.answer:
Platform Tips are optional contributions that financial contributors can add when they contribute on the platform. These tips support the Open Collective Platform, and they help ensure that we can keep the core service available at no cost to Collectives. Tips do not reduce the amount your Organization or the Collectives you host receive, because they are added on top of the intended support.

If you prefer a more traditional pricing model, you can opt for a simple 5% platform fee instead of tips. This removes tips from the contribution flow and applies a fixed fee to incoming funds. If that sounds better for you, please contact us and we will switch you over.

SetupGuide.2FA.Description: Two Factor Authentication (2FA) adds an extra layer of protection to your personal account (and therefore also to your Organization) . 2FA will require a second (in addition to your password) unique to you identifier when logging in. This prevents unauthorized access and is critical when using the platform for real world financial activities.
SetupGuide.2FARequirements.Description: To fully protect your Organization, It is important that all your admins enable Two Factor Authentication (2FA) in their accounts. We recommend you enable the setting that forces all admins to also setup 2FA.
SetupGuide.ApproveExpense.Description: Expenses are requests for payment submitted by contributors. Approving expenses is a key step in managing your organization's finances.
SetupGuide.ChartOfAccounts: Set up your chart of accounts
SetupGuide.ChartOfAccounts.Description: A Chart-of-Accounts enables you to categorize expenses and manually added funds in compliance with your accounting requirements. Setup your chart of accounts, categorize your expenses and added funds and your transaction exports will include this information. This will save you time and money when doing your accounting.
SetupGuide.ChartOfAccountsForCollectives: Extend chart of accounts to managed funds

Adapt your chart of accounts to include accounting categories specific to hosted Collectives and managed funds. This ensures that all expenses and added funds are clearly accounted for separate from your own organizational finances.
SetupGuide.CollectiveExpensesPolicy.Desc: Provide information and guidance to expense submitters about the types of expenses you are willing to pay, and what information you need to make the process easier.
SetupGuide.ContributionPolicy.Descriptio: Describe your contribution policy to align expectations and build trust with contributors.
SetupGuide.CreateProject.Description: Projects help you organize your work and showcase specific initiatives within your collective. Create a project to highlight your efforts and engage your community.
SetupGuide.CustomizeProfileSections.Desc: Highlight important information on your public profile by customizing the sections displayed.
SetupGuide.EnableHosting.Description: Fiscal hosting enables you to manage other Collectives and groups' money under your fiscal and legal umbrella. In addition to your own Organization's finances.
SetupGuide.ExpensesPolicy.Description: Describe your process and requirements for processing payment requests. Let expense submitters know what you need from them in order to effectively process their payment requests and ensure faster payouts.
SetupGuide.FindAndApplyHosting.Descripti: If you don't have a fiscal host yet, you can find one that suits your needs on the platform and apply to them directly from your profile.
SetupGuide.HostApplications.Description: Open your doors to Collectives. Interested groups will be able to submit applications from your public profile page.
SetupGuide.HostingFees.Description: The platform enables you to automatically collect hosting fees from your hosted Collectives. Fees are applied to contributions and added funds. Set your default hosting fees, they will be applied to all Collectives (while allowing you to also set custom fees for specific Collectives).
SetupGuide.InviteAdmins.CollectiveDescri: A collective works best with multiple administrators to help manage its activities. Invite at least one more admin to help you manage your Collective.
SetupGuide.InviteAdmins.Description: We require there be at least two admins in the organizations. This guarantees that no one person holds exclusive access to the account. It also reduces the potential for fraudulent use of the account.
SetupGuide.MoneyManagement.Description: Money management enables you to add funds to your account and pay expenses. This is a critical step towards being able to fully use the platform for your financial operations.
SetupGuide.PublicProfile.Description: Your public profile lets the world know you are active on the platform. It tells your story with a written description of your {type, select, ORGANIZATION {Organization} COLLECTIVE {Collective} other {Account}}, your mission and what are your goals using the platform.
SetupGuide.PublishUpdate.Description: Keep your community informed by publishing updates about your organization's activities, milestones, and news.
SetupGuide.SetupTiers.Description: Contribution tiers allow you to define different levels of support for your contributors. Set up tiers to encourage more contributions and build a community around your organization.
SetupGuide.Stripe: Set up Stripe for receiving contributions
SetupGuide.Stripe.Description: We use Stripe as a payment processor for receiving payments and contributions. Stripe itself provides many payment options including credit cards and bank transfers. Connect your account to Stripe in order to receive payments and contributions into your Organization's account.
SetupGuide.Wise.Description: We use Wise for seamless expense payments. Wise provides global coverage and competitive payment processing fees. Connect to your Wise account in order to pay expenses with a click of a button.

solutions.features.crowdfunding.descript: Launch campaigns to raise support for both one-time and continuously funded projects.
solutions.features.expenseProcessing.des: Process payment requests, pay invoices and reimbursements using automated integrations.
solutions.features.hosting.description: Provide a fiscal umbrella by safely managing the money of unincorporated groups.
solutions.features.item.accept-applicati: Accept applications from groups that are interested in being hosted by you. A conversation thread within each application documents the review and acceptance process until they are either accepted (and become hosted collectives) or rejected.
Accept applications from groups looking for a host
solutions.features.item.accept-contribut: Setup crowdfunding campaigns to engage your community. Completed contributions are automatically recorded in the ledger and added to your account balances.
solutions.features.item.accept-requests-: A step-by-step payment request form will walk users through filing correct and complete payment requests. Include your own unique instructions on how to properly submit a payment request in order to get paid.
Accept requests from people asking to get paid
solutions.features.item.add-money-to-you: When money shows up in your bank account or a check is received and processed, add it to an account and it is immediately available for disbursement.
solutions.features.item.all-financial-ac: At the heart of the platform is a transaction ledger. All financial activities on the platform generate ledger transactions.
solutions.features.item.approve-payment-: Review payment requests that have been submitted. Approve the legitimate requests you wish to pay and reject or delete the others.
solutions.features.item.automated-securi: Real time security checks are integrated into the payment tool and will alert you if something is suspicious. Green means safe to pay, yellow is a heads up and red requires attention.
Automated security checks protect against fraud
solutions.features.item.categorize-finan: Setup your chart of accounts and categorize your disbursements and added funds. Include this in your exports and reduce the time, effort and accounting costs.
solutions.features.item.charge-hosting-f: Automatically charge hosting fees from your hosted collectives Fees are automatically applied and tracked in the ledger and visible to both you and your hosted collectives.
solutions.features.item.check-your-balan: Money added to an account increases its balance and money spent (or transferred) will decrease its balance. You always know where you stand because the balance is always up-to-date and verifiable.
solutions.features.item.collect-tax-form: Automatically collect USA tax forms from people who get paid through the platform. At the end of the fiscal year download all the relevant tax-forms, ready to submit to the authorities.
solutions.features.item.collectives-auto: Collectives always have access to up-to-date balances in their accounts and can operate autonomously.
solutions.features.item.collectives-deci: Collectives can independently review and approve their own expenses. Approved expenses will await your review and payment.
Collectives decide which expenses to pay
solutions.features.item.connect-your-ban: Connect your platform account to your preferred banking services and reconcile off-platform transactions with on-platform financial activities.
solutions.features.item.different-ways-t: Flexible tiers enable you to create a diversity of crowdfunding campaigns. Design tiers that are appropriate for you and your audience. Collect tips, one time contributions and recurring contributions.
solutions.features.item.document-financi: Upload and track financial agreements. Link agreements to hosted collectives and reference them when paying disbursements.
solutions.features.item.easily-work-your: Mark payment requests as "incomplete" when they are sent back to submitters for correction. Mark them as "on hold" while you are looking into them with your accountant or lawyer.
Easily work your way through all payment requests
solutions.features.item.efficiently-proc: All approved payment requests are checked against collective balances. When the balance is sufficient they show up in your queue of ready-to-pay expenses.
solutions.features.item.everything-you-n: Your dashboard brings together all the tools you need to collaboratively manage your finances and stay on top of financial activities that require your attention.
Everything you need to know & do in one place
solutions.features.item.export-ledger-da: Provide your accountants with periodic exports of detailed ledger transactions.
Export ledger data for your accountants
solutions.features.item.give-people-cont: Assign administrators to manage specific accounts. Add or transfer money into the accounts them and let your team manage spending on their own.
solutions.features.item.host-other-group: Collectives are mini-organizations within your organization. Each collective can setup their own accounts, crowdfunding campaigns and projects.
solutions.features.item.invite-people-to: Send payment request invitations to people who are not on the platform. They will receive an invitation that will guide them to create a new user, complete and submit the payment request.
solutions.features.item.legible-financia: A periodic (monthly, quarterly, yearly) transaction statement provides you an overview of ledger activity. Drill down into every number in the statement to review and verify the underlying ledger transactions.
solutions.features.item.move-money-betwe: Transfer money easily between accounts. Starting a new project? Transfer an allocated amount into a separate account in order to manage spending.
solutions.features.item.organize-your-mo: Organize your money and control your spending with accounts. Create accounts for holding reserves, for crowdfunding contributions and for spending.
solutions.features.item.pay-approved-pay: One tool bring together all the information you need to quickly and effectively pay approved payment requests and other disbursements.
solutions.features.item.pay-instantly.de: Pay using Wise & PayPal integrations or manually mark expenses that have been paid off-platform (for example: from your bank account) as paid.
solutions.features.item.quickly-resolve-: Each expense is a conversation thread with all the people involved in its submission, review and payment. The correspondence is saved for future reference.
solutions.features.item.set-commit-to-fu: Create one time goals for one time projects. Create recurring goals to ask your community for long term support.
solutions.features.item.spend-within-you: Automatic balance protection guarantees that you only pay expenses that can be covered by current account balances.
solutions.features.item.tell-the-world-y: Activate a public profile to make yourself and your financials visible to the world and to invite broader engagement with crowdfunding campaigns and payment requests.
Tell the world your financial story
solutions.features.item.trace-and-verify: All financial platform activities (payment requests, contributions, grants, etc.) can be traced to their related ledger transactions and vice versa.
Trace and verify all financial activities
solutions.features.item.track-promised-f: Have you been awarded a grant and are now expecting payments to arrive? Document and track expected income until it arrives and is added to your accounts.
solutions.features.participatoryFinances: Empower your people and teams to manage their finances using our simplified and approachable financial tools.
solutions.features.realTimeBalances.desc: Keep track of balances, income and spending using up to the minute balances.
solutions.features.section.accounting-ac: Review & verify financial activities and provide your accountants with reliable information for your accounting processes.
Create a variety of crowdfunding campaigns: simple tip-jar with one time contributions, one-time goals, monthly recurring goals and even yearly memberships for generating continuous income via crowdfunding.
solutions.features.section.financial-pla: An integrated toolbox for collaboratively and transparently managing your finances.
solutions.features.section.hosting.descr: Invite other groups to operate under your financial and legal umbrella as Collectives. With a small team using the platform you can efficiently support thousands of groups and projects.
solutions.features.section.money-out.des: A comprehensive suite of tools for submitting, review, correcting, approving and paying out disbursements. A small team of administrators can efficiently handle thousands of monthly payment requests.
solutions.features.transparency.descript: Communicate your finances, transactions and real-time balances to your community.

At Open Collective, we work every day to make sure that our platform is a safe and simple place for collectives to grow.
